00030 int TemplateCreator::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData,TSetupData *setup){
00031   // Print extra info if we're debugging this module:

00033      cout<<"-----I'm debugging TemplateCreator::BeforeFirstEntry() "<<endl;

00042 // Called once for each event in the main event loop
00043 // Return non-zero to indicate a problem and terminate the event loop
00044 int TemplateCreator::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData* gData,TSetupData *setup){
00045 
00046   // Prepare a few variables
00047   std::string bankname, detname;
00048   PulseIslandList thePulseIslands;
00049   StringPulseIslandMap::const_iterator it;
00050 
00051   // Create the TemplateFitter that we will use
00052   TemplateFitter* template_fitter = new TemplateFitter();
00053 
00054   // Loop over each detector
00055   for(it = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.begin(); it != gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap.end(); ++it){
00056     
00057     // Get the bank and detector names for this detector
00058     bankname = it->first;
00059     detname = setup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00060 
00061     // Create the pulse candidate finder for this detector
00062     PulseCandidateFinder* pulse_candidate_finder = new PulseCandidateFinder(detname, fOpts);
00063 
00064     // Get the TPIs
00065     thePulseIslands = it->second;
00066     if (thePulseIslands.size() == 0) continue; // no pulses here..
00067 
00068     // Try and get the template (it may have been created in a previous event)
00069     std::string template_name = "hTemplate_" + detname;
00070     TH1D* hTemplate = fTemplateArchive->GetTemplate(template_name.c_str());
00071 
00072     // Loop through all the pulses
00073     for (PulseIslandList::iterator pulseIter = thePulseIslands.begin(); pulseIter != thePulseIslands.end(); ++pulseIter) {
00074 
00075       // First we will see how many candidate pulses there are on the TPI
00076       pulse_candidate_finder->FindPulseCandidates(*pulseIter);
00077       int n_pulse_candidates = pulse_candidate_finder->GetNPulseCandidates();
00078 
00079       std::vector<TPulseIsland*> pulse_candidates = pulse_candidate_finder->GetPulseCandidates();
00080 
00081       // we only continue if there is more than one pulse candidate on the TPI
00082       /*      if (n_pulse_candidates == 1) {
00083 
00084         // Add the first pulse directly to the template (although we may try and choose a random pulse to start with)
00085         if (Debug() && hTemplate == NULL) { // for debugging, just print add one pulse to the template
00086           AddPulseToTemplate(hTemplate, *pulseIter);
00087         }
00088 
00089         // all the other pulses will be fitted to the template and then added to it
00090         template_fitter->FitPulseToTemplate(hTemplate, *pulseIter);
00091         if (Debug()) {
00092           std::cout << detname << "(" << bankname << "): Pulse #" << pulseIter - thePulseIslands.begin() << ": "
00093                     << "Fitted Parameters: Ped = " << template_fitter->GetPedestal() << ", Amp = " << template_fitter->GetAmplitude()
00094                     << ", Time = " << template_fitter->GetTime() << ", Chi2 = " << template_fitter->GetChi2() << std::endl;
00095         }
00096         // we keep on adding pulses until adding pulses has no effect on the template
00097         }*/
00098     }
00099     // Save the template to the file
00100     fTemplateArchive->SaveTemplate(hTemplate);
00101   }
00102 
00103   return 0;
00104 }

00124 void TemplateCreator::AddPulseToTemplate(TH1D* & hTemplate, const TPulseIsland* pulse) {
00125 
00126   // Get the samples so that we can add them to the template
00127   const std::vector<int>& theSamples = pulse->GetSamples();
00128   int n_samples = theSamples.size();
00129 
00130   // If the template histogram is NULL, then create it
00131   if (hTemplate == NULL) {
00132 
00133     // Names for the histograms
00134     std::string bankname = pulse->GetBankName();
00135     std::string detname = TSetupData::Instance()->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00136     std::string histname = "hTemplate_" + detname;
00137     std::string histtitle = "Template Histogram for the " + detname + " channel";
00138     hTemplate = new TH1D(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), n_samples, 0, n_samples);
00139   }
00140 
00141   // Now loop through the samples and add to the template
00142   for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator sampleIter = theSamples.begin(); sampleIter != theSamples.end(); ++sampleIter) {
00143     hTemplate->Fill(sampleIter - theSamples.begin(), *sampleIter);
00144   }
00145 }
